name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Multiple media outlets reported that Hero Entertainment, a shareholder and co-publisher of Black Myth: Wukong, asked streaming creators to avoid discussing topics such as "isolation," "lockdown," "COVID-19," and "feminism" in live broadcasts or videos related to the game, and not to mention policies, opinions, and news related to China's gaming industry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, the media reported that a group of principals and vice principals of a middle school in Meishan, Sichuan, embezzled 3.5 million yuan in bribes. Their method of corruption was to turn the school's printing room and canteen into independent operations, and they received bribes of 1.41 million yuan from them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 20, Yishide Beijing Medical Technology Co., Ltd. issued a statement accusing Ideal Auto of deceiving it to write an apology statement and using it for commercial promotion. It also stated that it would cooperate with Huawei in the future.
In addition, the statement also allegedly attacked the health of Li Xiang, the founder of Ideal Auto, saying that "Li Xiang will die of liver cancer soon if no intervention is made."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to multiple gaming media reports, Hero Entertainment, a shareholder and co-publisher of Black Myth: Wukong, sent an email to some Western streaming creators, asking them to avoid discussing topics such as "isolation," "lockdown," "COVID-19," and "feminism" in live broadcasts or videos related to the game, and not to mention policies, opinions, and news related to China's gaming industry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 20, Xi'an Middle School protest follow-up
After students reported the school's formaldehyde exceeding the standard to the local education department 98 times, the school suspended supplementary classes.
But not only was the reporter found directly afterwards, but the whistleblower also received a call from the police and was asked to delete the post.
At the same time, the school asked parents to pay attention to their children's daily call records

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 16, the military procurement website published the "Announcement on the Dishonesty of Xi'an University of Technology", "Announcement on the Dishonesty of Xi'an Jiaotong University", and "Announcement on the Dishonesty of Southwest Jiaotong University". 
The three universities were banned from participating in the Rocket Force's procurement activities for three years due to "bid rigging" by the Rocket Force Logistics Department's Procurement and Supply Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 13, the Shanxi Provincial Department of Education issued an urgent notice, saying that some teachers would visit Beijing on the 14th, requiring all municipal education bureaus to immediately investigate their staff and resolutely prevent them from causing trouble in Beijing. 
The day before, on the 12th, a group of former private substitute teachers had protested outside the Provincial Department of Education, demanding the payment of pensions and other demands.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: With the recent explosion of Black Myth: Wukong, stocks related to Journey to the West have also surged. However, the most magical thing is that in addition to the game publishers, stocks with names that happen to have Journey to the West elements, such as Dongtu Technology, Tibet Tianlu, and Yunliwuli, have also surged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Some local institutions were required to download a software called "Secrecy View" to receive confidentiality education.
Through searching, it was found that a large number of people in the system had given negative comments in the comment section and complained bitterly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, the Chinese Embassy in France expressed its position on the "Evergreen Laurel Hotel in Paris refused to hang the five-star red flag" incident: "The Chinese Embassy in France highly appreciates and firmly supports the patriotic act of the Chinese community in France."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 21, The Paper reported that a veteran was impersonated for 26 years, "He took my place at a state-owned enterprise while I was a security guard." It is reported that Zhuang Zhenfeng served in Heilongjiang in 1990. When he applied for a veteran preferential card last year, he found that his identity was used by his cousin Lv, who was commended for working at the state-owned Yongmei Company. Lv has been working under the identity of "Zhuang Zhenfeng" for many years and has published articles publicly for his outstanding performance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, a netizen revealed that someone in Gu Ailing's Instagram comment section accused Gu Ailing of being a "traitor who betrayed the country that raised you." Gu Ailing replied domineeringly: Which one are you talking about? After the screenshot was exposed, Gu Ailing deleted the relevant comments, but then a large number of netizens flocked to her comment section to accuse her of being a "two-faced person."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, under a video saying "If Harris is elected, she might go to war with China", a large number of netizens expressed their support for Harris in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 21, the news that Taiwanese male artist Xu Guanghan had enlisted in the military topped the third trending search on Weibo.
A large number of fans expressed their regret, which triggered dissatisfaction among patriotic bloggers and netizens, who believed that Xu Guanghan had joined the Taiwan military and would confront the mainland in the future, and that he should be boycotted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 21, Guangzhou suffered severe flooding due to heavy rain, resulting in at least two deaths from electric shock.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Caution] A person was electrocuted under a telephone pole.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/KuUUnAJ400

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 21, Hangzhou.
Institutional personnel began to conduct centralized training on how to promote Internet "Internet certificates" and "Internet numbers".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, a video of a DeepBlue SL03 new energy vehicle catching fire after it allegedly hit a lifted floor tile went viral online. Deng Chenghao, CEO of DeepBlue Automobile, said: The sharp corners of the stone tile pierced two battery cells and caused the fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 20, China Daily: Various signs indicate that the US economic recession is imminent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In order to protest the publisher of Black Myth Wukong's restriction on the freedom of speech of creators, Moonmoon, the most popular anchor of the Black Myth Wukong channel on Twitch, directly changed the name of his room to "COVID-19 Isolation Taiwan (a real country) Feminist propaganda"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in the Phoenix TV program "News Today Talk", the host asked expert Chen Haoyang, "For Ukraine, which owns F-16 fighter jets, to what extent will its air combat capabilities be improved in the future?" Expert Chen Haoyang: There will be no substantial improvement. The F-16 is a third-generation fighter. For a fighter with a lifespan of nearly 30 years, it is equivalent to an elderly person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 20, when a group of freshmen majoring in electronic and electrical engineering at the University of Hong Kong were discussing employment prospects in the civil industry, a freshman suddenly revealed that his father owed wages and colluded with gangs to suppress workers who were asking for wages.
This sparked heated discussions among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The 10th National Advanced Training Course on New Technologies for Pathogen Nucleic Acid Detection was held in Changsha from August 19 to 21.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 20, Nanchang, Jiangxi. It was revealed online that 19 cleaning staff worked at the Xuhui Center real estate project in Nanchang Economic Development Zone. They have been owed wages for more than a year, with a total amount of about 260,000 yuan. A worker said: "We started working as cleaners in Nanchang Xuhui Center in early May 2023, and it has been more than a year. After the work was completed, the more than 260,000 yuan in wages that the 19 workers deserved were owed and have not been paid yet. In order to get our wages back, we traveled back and forth between Nanchang and Wuhan many times, but we have not been able to contact the person in charge. At that time, the contact was with Beijing Jinlongteng Company, the general contractor of Xuhui Center. After failing to contact anyone, we found Party A, Xuhui Real Estate. Xuhui refused the request on the grounds that the general contractor had not settled accounts with them." A staff member of the Wage Arrears Office of the Labor and Social Security Supervision and Law Enforcement Brigade of Nanchang Economic Development Zone said: "It is true that the workers have not yet received their wages. Although the company involved has been found, there is basically no one in the company at present."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, lawyer Zhang Qingfang published a statement saying that on that day he went to the Lianshui County Detention Center in Jiangsu Province to meet with his client Qian Cheng, who had been beaten to a cripple by the provincial disciplinary inspection commission’s special investigation team. After the guards left, Qian Cheng told lawyer Zhang that he was beaten for half an hour by several cell heads in the detention center on the evening of the 18th. In addition, Qian Cheng also revealed that the Lianshui County Detention Center had been using prison bullies to exploit the detainees, and the cell head also asked him to pay protection money to the detention center guards, and he was beaten after he refused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 19, Phoenix.com reported that its interview with Sun Yafu on "How to get Taiwanese people to oppose Taiwan independence" was ridiculed by many netizens.
